name: Literal ShapeShifter
description:
Status

Projects current status is evaluating. This was a game jam game for ludum dare and is open for judging/

Hoping to turn this in to a mechanic in a larger game.

Description

Avoid obstacles and turn yourself in to the shape of the gate to advance.

Controls

Keyboard only supported: Move using the arrow keys

Minimum Specs

Chrome browser recommended

Special Thanks
  • F.J. - Sound / programming
  • D.F. - programming
